{about me}

Hi! My name is Maciej Kędziora. I graduated from digital electronics at Wroclaw University of Science and Technology. During college, I spent most of my time learning about network, IoT, and microcontroller programming.

Currently working as a DevOps Engineer at Univio, where I build AWS cloud infrastructure in collaboration with solution architects. I manage Infrastructure as Code with Terraform ensuring 100% system coverage, develop monitoring systems using Prometheus & Grafana, and create CI/CD pipelines in GitLab to support development teams. Previously worked at Abaro.net managing Kubernetes clusters, DC/OS Blue-Green deployments, and automation with Python/Bash scripts.

I am a technology lover, I am eager to discover and learn new things, and I pursue my goals with great persistence.
